title: What's new in v2.47.0
content:
Features:
- Post-processing (CRT, vignette, and bloom)
- Center-to-corner shape creation in addition to corner-to-corner
- Color replace with multiple color pairs
- Thai language support
- Image drag-n-drop from other apps to Pixquare
- Tile eye dropper

Enhancements:
- Multiple tiles can be moved at once
- Added next/previous color within the palette to the keyboard shortcut list
- Added a View in Files option for files
- Added a low-memory warning to avoid out-of-memory device freeze
- The bottom info bar can show info of multiple frames
- Auto-select tile brush when selecting a tile if the tile eraser is active
- Added an option to clear time-lapse data for individual files

Fixes:
- Fixed layer-only panel preview hovers triggering the main panel's preview enlarged view
- Fixed share view pausing music
- Some rare crashes
